eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: RewardExtraPaid
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: RewardPaid
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: Staked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: Withdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawnERC20
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

functionDecorators.name: adminAddRewardsExtraToken
functionDecorators.description: Adds Rewards Extra token to contract, can be done only during setup.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardsExtraToken
parameterDecorators.description: Contract address of Extra Rewards Token.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardsExtraPerPeriodCap
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be distributed each period.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardsExtraOwner
parameterDecorators.description: address where to send remaining tokens after contract closes.

functionDecorators.name: adminClose
functionDecorators.description: Close contract after End and Grace period and withdraw unclamed rewards tokens.

functionDecorators.name: adminEnd
functionDecorators.description: Option to end contract.

functionDecorators.name: adminStart
functionDecorators.description: Updates contract setup and mark contract status as Running if all requirements are met.

functionDecorators.name: adminStartNow
functionDecorators.description: Option to start contract even there is no deposits yet.

functionDecorators.name: adminWithdrawERC20
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw other than LP or Rewards tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Get the balance of a given account.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: User for which to retrieve balance.

functionDecorators.name: calculateReward
functionDecorators.description: Calculates rewards for the user since last period claimed rewards available for withdraw (taking into account hold periods for rewards).

functionDecorators.name: calculateRewardExtra
functionDecorators.description: Calculates extra rewards for the user since last period claimed rewards available for withdraw (taking into account hold periods for rewards).

functionDecorators.name: calculateRewardExtraTotal
functionDecorators.description: Calculates total rewards extra (including those on hold if any) for the user till current period.

functionDecorators.name: calculateRewardTotal
functionDecorators.description: Calculates total rewards (including those on hold if any) for the user till current period.

functionDecorators.name: claimReward
functionDecorators.description: Claims outstanding rewards for the sender. First updates outstanding reward allocation and then transfers.

functionDecorators.name: currentPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Calculates current period, if contract is ended returns currentPeriod + 1 (totalPeriods).

functionDecorators.name: estimateReward
functionDecorators.description: Returns estimated current period reward for the user based on current total supply and his balance.

functionDecorators.name: estimateRewardExtra
functionDecorators.description: Returns estimated current period reward extra for the user based on current total supply and his balance.

functionDecorators.name: exit
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws LP Tokens stake from pool and claims any rewards.

functionDecorators.name: isOnHold
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if hold for withdraw is active for given user address.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewardsExtraTotalCap
functionDecorators.description: Returns Total reward extra cap for all periods.

functionDecorators.name: rewardsTotalCap
functionDecorators.description: Returns Total reward cap for all periods.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: Stakes an amount for the sender, assumes sender approved allowace at LP Token contract _amount for this contract address.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws given LP Token stake amount from the pool.
